1/* mpf_neg -- Negate a float.
2
3Copyright 1993-1995, 2001 Free Software Foundation, Inc.

8it under the terms of either:
9

11 Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your
12 option) any later version.
13
14or

16 * the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software
17 Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any
18 later version.
19
20or both in parallel, as here.
21
22The GNU MP Library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but
23WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY
24or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License
25for more details.
26
27You should have received copies of the GNU General Public License and the
28GNU Lesser General Public License along with the GNU MP Library. If not,
29see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/. */
30
31#include "gmp.h"
32#include "gmp-impl.h"
33
34void
35mpf_neg (mpf_ptr r, mpf_srcptr u)
36{
37 mp_size_t size;
38
39 size = -u->_mp_size;
40 if (r != u)
41 {
42 mp_size_t prec;
43 mp_size_t asize;
44 mp_ptr rp, up;
45
46 prec = r->_mp_prec + 1; /* lie not to lose precision in assignment */
47 asize = ABS (size);
48 rp = r->_mp_d;
49 up = u->_mp_d;
50
51 if (asize > prec)
52 {
53 up += asize - prec;
54 asize = prec;
55 }
56
57 MPN_COPY (rp, up, asize);
58 r->_mp_exp = u->_mp_exp;
59 size = size >= 0 ? asize : -asize;
60 }
61 r->_mp_size = size;
62}
63
